articles.author: Dana Hedgpeth, Sari Horwitz, Toluse Olorunnipa
articles.title: ‘I formally apologize’: Biden condemns U.S. Indian boarding schools - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Joe Biden apologized to Native Americans on Friday for the U.S. government’s role in taking Native children from their families and cultures.
articles.content: GILA RIVER INDIAN COMMUNITY President Joe Biden apologized to Native Americans on Friday for the U.S. governments role in creating and operating Indian boarding schools that for 150 years aimed to as… [+268 chars]

articles.author: Alec Schemmel
articles.title: Ex-Trump officials tell Americans to 'heed General Kelly's warning' Trump's a fascist - Fox News
articles.description: Thirteen former Trump administration officials penned a letter released by the Harris campaign on Friday, which implored voters to believe Gen. John Kelly's claims that former President Trump praised Adolf Hitler.
articles.content:
The Harris campaign on Friday put out a letter penned by 13 ex-Trump administration officials seeking to bolster claims made by former President Trump's former chief of staff John Kelly.
